essays.title: Personal Statement 1
essays.prompt: What are your career goals and how will the Melbourne MBA help you achieve them?

essays.title: Personal Statement 2
essays.prompt: Describe a significant leadership experience and what you learned from it.

essays.title: Personal Statement 3
essays.prompt: Tell us about a time when you faced a significant challenge and how you overcame it.

essays.title: Personal Statement 4
essays.prompt: How have you contributed to your community or promoted diversity and inclusion?
